info.title: FlipEm
info.author: Yossi
info.details:
FlipEm is a game where the object is to get every square on the board to have an X in it using the least amount of moves.
There are some rules, but it is much easier to figure them out while playing, than it is to explain them here.

-- Controls --
Point with the WiiMote
A    - Flip spot   
B    - Reset board 
+/-  - Increase/decrease size
Home - Return to loader
